title: Serif
content:
Does anyone know this font?  
Any help would be greatly appreciated.  
Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2015-03-08 at 12.16.46 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416010248/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-03-08%20at%2012.16.46%20PM.png) | 192.51 KB |
author: renuance

comments.content: Judging by the sample, I would say hand-lettered, not a font.

Given that all the repeating letters are a bit different from one another, I think this is custom hand-lettering, not a typeface.

EDIT: Similar typefaces:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixilate/pocket-serif-px/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416010248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixilate/pocket-serif-px/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixilate/pocket-serif-px/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixilate/rolig-serif-px/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416010248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixilate/rolig-serif-px/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixilate/rolig-serif-px/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wearecolt/bowler-hand/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416010248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wearecolt/bowler-hand/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wearecolt/bowler-hand/")
